resources.string: About App \n\nDo you know? Confusing Words in English and How to Use Them Correctly.

What are we? Mimsoft is one of the prime IT Agency that aims to provide all of IT services under one umbrella. Our slogan “Infinite Achievements” describes it all. The increasing demand of limitless services asks for unlimited solutions and that is exactly what we at mimsoft offer. We are proudly offering the undermentioned services to our valued clients. 

* Microsoft Licensed products including Office 365, sharepoint, SQL Server, System center and Microsoft Licensing. 

* SEO and Social Media Marketing and Management services. Our Social Media marketing and management team takes stress away from our clients for handling marketing and management of social media. From PPC to page boost and from post boosting to creating campaigns, we provide complete services to our clients and help them to outsource their social media management tasks. 

* Ecommerce Solutions. Our mimcart platform allows online stores to create their customized ecommerce store to get hassle free and customer oriented management system. 

* Development and Designing includes the services range from Designing of the website and applications to development. Our enthusiastic team offers our client an unparalleled quality of services and always ready to guide our clients.

English has a lot of commonly confused words. They either look alike, sound alike or worst of all look and sound alike but have completely different meanings. Other words look and sound different but are similar in meaning, and its hard to determine which is the correct. \nThis free app is specially designed and develop, to avoid commmon mistakes in English. It consists a list of more than 250 words that speakers and writers of English often confuse.

string.name: list
string.ol:
Share Point

System Center

SQL Server

Office 365

Microsoft Licensing
